pullrequest.title: Add ign-gazebo colcon script for windows

content.raw:
gazebo distro file is here: [#!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/31/add-ign-gazebo1-distro-file/](#!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/31/add-ign-gazebo1-distro-file/diff)

I added some missing deps in  [da64348](#!/osrf/release-tools/commits/da64348f4bdf670263aad98b04dfeba5d85fbb42) . The build is failing since yaml and zip can not be located. We probably need hack ignCmake to add support for them.
content.html:
gazebo distro file is here: #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/31/add-ign-gazebo1-distro-file/

I added some missing deps in da64348 . The build is failing since yaml and zip can not be located. We probably need hack ignCmake to add support for them.
